بحیرہ منجمد شمالی زمین کے سب سے شمالی حص: Where is the Arctic Ocean located? Arctic Ocean northernmost part of Earth

The Arctic Ocean includes the North Pole region in the middle of the Northern Hemisphere and extends south to about 60°N. The Arctic Ocean is surrounded by Eurasia and North America, and the borders follow topographic features: the Bering Strait on the Pacific side and the Greenland Scotland Ridge on the Atlantic side.
Where is the Arctic Ocean located? Arctic Ocean northernmost part of Earth

The North Pole is found in the Arctic Ocean, on constantly shifting pieces of sea ice. The North Pole is not part of any nation, although Russia placed a titanium flag on the seabed in 2007. The North Pole is the northernmost point on Earth.
